All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
It represents an Admin with access to system settings and the adminstrators have the ability create, update, delete database records.
AdminController
It Represents the Admin Controller
AdminUI
The Admin UI contains the main menu user interface for an Admin, which can only be accessed by logging in with admin account, an Admin can create, update, delete movie listings and movie showings, configure system settings, list top 5 ranking movies.
Booking
It represents a Booking made by a movieGoer for a movie showing
BookingController
It Represents the Booking Controller
BookingUI
It is user interface for a MovieGoer to make a Booking for movie tickets.
Cinema
It represents a Cinema that belongs to a Cineplex.
Cineplex
A Cineplex has a name identifier, a location and a list of cinemas that the cineplex contains.
CineplexController
It Represents the Cineplex Controller
CRUDMovieListingUI
It is an Admin interface to create, update, delete, list Movies.
CRUDMovieShowingUI
It is an Admin interface to create, update, delete, list Showings.
DatabaseController<DataType>
It Represent the Database Controller and it contains functions to read and write data of a certain data type from a database file.
Enumerators
Enumerators defined for readability and easier referencing
Enumerators.Age
The pricetype depends on the age category of the movie-goer
Enumerators.CinemaClass
The price type depends on the cinema class chosen by the movie-goer for the show.
Enumerators.ContentRating
The Content ratings are used to inform consumers, especially parents, of potentially objectionable content that is shown during the duration of the movie.
Enumerators.Day
The price type depends on which day of the week the movie show is taking place.
Enumerators.MovieType
The price of the movie ticket depends on the type of the movie, whether it is Regular 2D, Regular 3, Blockbuster 2D, Blockbuster 3D etc.
Enumerators.SeatStatus
The status of the seat, whether it is unoccupied or occupied.
Enumerators.ShowingStatus
It indicates the status of the movie, whether it is coming soon, preview, currently showing or end of showing.
Enumerators.User
The type of user, whether it is admin or movie-goer
Holiday
It Represents a Holiday defined in the system settings which is used in determining ticket pricing
HolidayController
It Represents the Holiday Controller
InputHandler
It is used to take user input of various primitive or low-level datatypes, and it is implemented for static declaration of Scanner, to prevent multiple Scanners from being created.
ListTopMovies
It is an user interface to list the top Movies, used by both Admin and MovieGoer.
MainController
It Represents the Main Controller and it contains path names of Database files to access, and initializes starting data for some database files.
MainUI
It is a user interface for user to select if they are a MovieGoer or Admin.
Movie
It Represents a Movie and its information
MovieController
It Represents the Movie Controller
MovieController.MovieAttribute
It is defined for readability and easier referencing of Movie attributes in the order of selection options provided to user when updating movie.
MovieGoer
It Represents a MovieGoer and their details are captured by the application upon booking of tickets.
MovieGoerUI
It is a user interface for a MovieGoer to search for movies, view movie details, search showings, book a ticket, view booking history,and list top 5 ranking movies, add a review to a movie.
PriceController
It Represents the Price Controller
PriceType
Empty interface implemented by classes that will affect the price of a movie ticket
Review
It Represents a Review added by MovieGoer to a Movie
SearchMovieUI
It is user interface to search for Movies, used by both Admin and MovieGoer.
SearchShowingUI
It is a User interface to search for Showings, used by both Admin and MovieGoer wherein an Admin can see all the Showings available in the Showing database, but a MovieGoer can only see Showings of Movies that are currently in "Preview" or "Now Showing" and with showtimes that have not passed the current datetime.
Seat
Represents a Seat in a SeatingLayout Contain the Seat's position and occupancy status
SeatingLayout
It Represents the SeatingLayout of a Cinema
Showing
It Represents a Showing for a Movie
ShowingController
It Represents the Showing Controller
ShowingController.ShowingAttribute
It is defined for readability and easier referencing of Showing attributes in the order of selection options provided to user when updating showing attributes.
SystemConfigUI
It is an Admin interface to configure system settings related to Holidays, ticket prices and Admin accounts.
Ticket
Represents a Ticket for a Showing Created when making a booking
UserHandler
It is used to take user input of custom-defined datatype which is Implemented for reuse in multiple methods.
